definition: far in the indefinite future (idiom); so far away it seems forever
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: But no U.S.-Taiwan free trade agreement is pending.
sentences.chinese: 但是，美臺籤自由貿易協定還遙遙無期。

sentences.english: Araya is on the brink of losing it all and is doubtful that he will ever return to Wall Street.
sentences.chinese: 至於有沒有重歸華爾街的希望，那就遙遙無期了。

sentences.english: A solution to the European debt crisis is further away than ever.
sentences.chinese: 看起來歐洲債務危機得到解決的日子遙遙無期。
